 10 town halls

 1 bill to protect children + law enforcement included in VAWA

html: President Bush exemplified true public service, opting to do what he believed was right for the nation over what was politically expedient. This has always been the hallmark of our government, and he and First Lady Barbara Bush practiced it every day.

html: Today, I join the nation in mourning the passing of President George H. W. Bush and honor the long legacy of his service. We have lost a true patriot who put his country first both on the battlefield during World War II and as a public servant.

html: #AZ01 Medicare beneficiaries often live on a fixed income, & costs are forcing them to make the tough decision between life-saving care & drugs or putting food on the table. I introduced the CAPS for Prescriptions Act to cap out-of-pocket costs Medicare beneficiaries pay.pic.twitter.com/rr1BKnniQC
text: #AZ01 Medicare beneficiaries often live on a fixed income, & costs are forcing them to make the tough decision between life-saving care & drugs or putting food on the table. I introduced the CAPS for Prescriptions Act to cap out-of-pocket costs Medicare beneficiaries pay.pic.twitter.com/rr1BKnniQC

html: Earlier this year, #AZ01 servicemembers at Silverbell learned that a portion of their allotted housing benefits were to be clawed back. Last month, I sent a letter to Governor Doug Ducey demanding immediate action from the state to halt this shameful recoupment of benefits.
text: Earlier this year, #AZ01 servicemembers at Silverbell learned that a portion of their allotted housing benefits were to be clawed back. Last month, I sent a letter to Governor Doug Ducey demanding immediate action from the state to halt this shameful recoupment of benefits.

html: This #FarmBill is a tremendous opportunity to do good for rural Arizona and rural America. I urge my colleagues to work together and develop a conference report that benefits all of rural America. #AZ01
text:
This #FarmBill is a tremendous opportunity to do good for rural Arizona and rural America. 

I urge my colleagues to work together and develop a conference report that benefits all of rural America. #AZ01

html: For Arizona’s future, we must promote conservation practices that allow our farmers and ranchers to conserve water in a way that is fair and equitable, by ensuring there is necessary funding. #AZ01 #FarmBill
text: For Arizona’s future, we must promote conservation practices that allow our farmers and ranchers to conserve water in a way that is fair and equitable, by ensuring there is necessary funding. #AZ01 #FarmBill

html: For Arizona’s forests, we must create a restoration economy that will grow jobs and provide value to rural communities, while reducing the risk of catastrophic wildfires. #AZ01 #FarmBill
text: For Arizona’s forests, we must create a restoration economy that will grow jobs and provide value to rural communities, while reducing the risk of catastrophic wildfires. #AZ01 #FarmBill

html: For Indian Country, we must promote tribal self-determination and sovereignty in forestry, nutrition, and education. We must also ensure that tribes are heard at USDA by the continued presence of the Office of Tribal Relations in the Office of the Secretary. #AZ01 #FarmBill
text: For Indian Country, we must promote tribal self-determination and sovereignty in forestry, nutrition, and education. We must also ensure that tribes are heard at USDA by the continued presence of the Office of Tribal Relations in the Office of the Secretary. #AZ01 #FarmBill

html: For Arizona's rural communities, we must help them build the broadband and other infrastructure they need to access markets, health care, and education. We must also protect rural development programs that help rural Americans grow or start their businesses. #AZ01 #FarmBill
text: For Arizona's rural communities, we must help them build the broadband and other infrastructure they need to access markets, health care, and education. We must also protect rural development programs that help rural Americans grow or start their businesses. #AZ01 #FarmBill

html: AZ ag producers must have a reliable & meaningful safety net. Producers across the country deserve certainty that'll back them up in times of low crop prices, just as families & vets should have a safety net when they are struggling to make ends meet. #AZ01 #FarmBill
text: AZ ag producers must have a reliable & meaningful safety net. Producers across the country deserve certainty that'll back them up in times of low crop prices, just as families & vets should have a safety net when they are struggling to make ends meet. #AZ01 #FarmBill

html: Today, we must put partisanship aside and work together to get results. We must aid our farmers and ranchers, help strengthen our rural communities, feed families and veterans who have fallen on hard times, and recognize tribal sovereignty. #FarmBill #AZ01

html: Eyeglasses, hearing aids, and dental care are essential health care needs for #AZ01 seniors, and each should be covered under Medicare. I cosponsored the Seniors Have Eyes, Ears, and Teeth Act to expand Medicare coverage to ensure these necessities are included for our seniors.

html: If you don't go to work & do your job, you don't get paid. It's as simple as that. Congress should work the same way. I intro'd legislation to withhold my paycheck, and those of every member of Congress, if we can't pass a bipartisan budget & do our job. #AZ01 #NoBudgetNoPaypic.twitter.com/jauiEsRZjN
text:
If you don't go to work & do your job, you don't get paid. It's as simple as that.

Congress should work the same way. I intro'd legislation to withhold my paycheck, and those of every member of Congress, if we can't pass a bipartisan budget & do our job. #AZ01 #NoBudgetNoPaypic.twitter.com/jauiEsRZjN

html: According to the Chamber of Commerce, more than $266m in AZ exports could be threatened by a trade war. Global trade supports ~800,000 AZ jobs. html: Sec. Zinke won't be lifting a ban on uranium mining in the Grand Canyon, but we need official documentation on guaranteed funds for continued mine cleanup. These mines caused health issues for thousands of #AZ01 folks & must be addressed.http://bit.ly/2L3UnBb

html: Roe v. Wade affirmed that women across the country have a right to safe, legal medical services that they need. Women’s choices are between themselves, their families, their doctors, & their faiths. Women’s health, especially in rural communities, cannot be put at risk. #RoevWade

html: This week, the House voted to pass two of my amendments to the Dept of the Interior approps bill. These amendments provide resources to tribal communities to repair or build public safety facilities & funds the Office of Navajo-Hopi Relocation. #AZ01 More:http://bit.ly/2L9ZP5J

html: Rural #AZ01 has a voice at the table this year as we work on the final #FarmBill. I am pleased to be on the Farm Bill Conference Committee. Ag touches every corner of AZ, and this bill will impact every single American. We must get this legislation right.http://bit.ly/2utNfUz

html: Arizonans deserve access to quality and affordable healthcare. Suspending the ACA risk-adjustment program injects uncertainty into a system that relies on certainty, and hurts hardworking #AZ01 families. I urge the Administration to reverse this decision.http://bit.ly/2uIOCOw

html: There should be no scenario where the President of the United States stands up on the international stage and denounces the work of our nation’s intelligence community while praising a foreign leader who has so blatantly ordered an attack on our very democracy. #AZ01
